parameters.query:
UPDATE pipeline_sessions SET status = 'processing', current_step = 'loading_data', updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $json.session_id }};

SELECT vs.script_text, vs.timing_marks, vp.prompt_text, vp.scene_descriptions,
       ci.title, ci.concept, ci.visual_description,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_api_token') AS a2e_api_token,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_base_url') AS a2e_base_url,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_avatar_id') AS default_avatar_id,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_voice_id') AS default_voice_id,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_voice_country') AS voice_country,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_voice_region') AS voice_region,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_speech_rate') AS speech_rate,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_resolution') AS default_resolution,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_background') AS default_background,
       (SELECT value FROM app_settings WHERE key = 'a2e_captions') AS captions_enabled
FROM pipeline_sessions ps
LEFT JOIN voice_scripts vs ON vs.id = ps.voice_script_id
LEFT JOIN video_prompts vp ON vp.id = ps.video_prompt_id
LEFT JOIN content_ideas ci ON ci.id = ps.idea_id
WHERE ps.id = {{ $json.session_id }};

UPDATE pipeline_sessions SET
  status = 'ready_for_review',
  current_step = 'review',
  raw_video_url = '{{ $json.raw_video_url.split("'").join("''") }}',
  final_video_url = '{{ $json.raw_video_url.split("'").join("''") }}',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = {{ $json.session_id }};

UPDATE pipeline_steps SET status = 'completed', completed_at = NOW()
WHERE session_id = {{ $json.session_id }} AND step_name = 'a2e_video';
